openzeppelin-upgrades.title: OpenZeppelin Upgrades
openzeppelin-upgrades.description: Integrate upgrades into your existing workflow. Plugins for Hardhat and Truffle to deploy and manage upgradeable contracts on Ethereum.
openzeppelin-upgrades.author: OpenZeppelin

db-kit.title: db-kit
db-kit.description: Smart contract utility widget leveraging @truffle/db, a system of record for blockchain metadata.
db-kit.author: Truffle

truffle-plugin-verify.title: truffle-plugin-verify
truffle-plugin-verify.description: This truffle plugin allows you to automatically verify your smart contracts' source code on Etherscan, straight from the Truffle CLI.
truffle-plugin-verify.author: Rosco Kalis

truffle-flattener.title: Truffle Flattener
truffle-flattener.description: Truffle Flattener concats solidity files from Truffle and Buidler projects with all of their dependencies.
truffle-flattener.author: Nomic Labs

truffle-seeder.title: Truffle Seeder
truffle-seeder.description: Easily seed initial data to smart contracts using this npm package.
truffle-seeder.author: Liberty Pie

simba-truffle-integration.title: SIMBA Truffle Integration
simba-truffle-integration.description: Enables interaction with your SIMBA Enterprise Platform Instance from inside your VS Code development environment.
simba-truffle-integration.author: SIMBAChain

truffle-multibaas-plugin.title: truffle-multibaas-plugin
truffle-multibaas-plugin.description: MultiBaas is blockchain middleware that makes it fast and easy to develop, deploy, and operate on the Ethereum and OmiseGO blockchain platforms
truffle-multibaas-plugin.author: Curvegrid

moonbeam-truffle-plugin.title: Moonbeam Truffle Plugin
moonbeam-truffle-plugin.description: The plugin is used to get you started with a local development Moonbeam node.
moonbeam-truffle-plugin.author: PureStake
